description: Chilopsis linearis 'Bubba'™ is a fast-growing, upright clone to 30 feet tall and wide. In late spring and summer 'Bubba'™ produces masses of large, dark burgundy, fragrant flowers. This is a winter deciduous tree that flushes out in the spring with glossy, dark green leaves. Like other desert willows 'Bubba'™ is a great choice for full sun, low maintenance, water efficient landscapes. Although it is not seedless, it produces fewer pods than most selections.
flower_month: April, May, June, July, August, September, October
accenting_features: Fragrance, Multi-trunk Tree, Showy Flowers, Specimen
month_of_interest: April, May, June, July, August, September
location_uses: Background, Lawn, Patio, Parking Lot, Street Tree, Walls / Fences
special_uses: Erosion Control, Wind Break, Shade Tree
